episodes.title: Raised in a Cult: Tammy Rene's Journey through Childhood Trauma to Wholeness
episodes.description:
Join me for an incredible conversation with Tammy René!! As a survivor of childhood sexual and physical abuse in a cult, Tammy René brings her personal experience of overcoming trauma to audiences to inspire hope and understanding. Her messages offer victims of childhood trauma keys to healing and offer insights for helping lift those who struggle on their healing journey. She currently volunteers with her local Suicide Prevention Network as a PTSD support group facilitator and has worked as a CASA (Court Appointed Special Advocate) on behalf of abused and neglected children. 

Tammy hosts two podcast series: Survivor Shift: Moving from Surviving to Thriving where she interviews others about critical shifts in thought and behavior that allowed them to move forward after trauma; Building on the Light's guests share pieces of light they've discovered that help them continue to build a life they can thrive in. You can find both podcasts on YouTube at https://www.youtube.com/@TammyRene915

She is the author of her bestselling and award-winning memoir, Miracles in the Dark: How a Childhood Cult and Abuse Victim Reclaimed the Light. You can order her book here: https://a.co/d/dkl7qSs

***************************************************************************************

CashApp - cash.app/$SurvivingTogether 

Channel link -    / @survivingtogethersass  

To contact Mak directly, email her at survivingtogethersass@gmail.com

All are welcome as long as you abide by the rules:
1. Be respectful of others in the comments & Live chat. It's critical that people feel this is a safe, supportive & caring environment to discuss their feelings/share their stories about an emotionally difficult topic. So no mean people allowed!!
2. If it's not your story to tell, don't repeat it. What is shared here is highly personal & not meant for general consumption. 
3. No religion or politics talk. There are other channels for that.
 
DISCLAIMER: Surviving Together is an online peer support group for sexual assault survivors & their supporters, as well as a platform to provide education about sexual assault & related topics. The information provided here is not intended or implied to be a substitute for professional mental health diagnosis or treatment. All content including text, graphics, images and information contained on or available through this channel is for general &/or educational purposes only. This channel makes no representation and assumes no responsibility for the accuracy of information on or available through this channel. You are encouraged to confirm any information obtained from or through this channel with other sources and review all information with a mental healthcare professional.
